entry.title: Python core developer
entry.summary:
Position Summary
Candidate will contribute to the development of our existing Python Sqreen Agent. Our agents are running into our customers applications. Candidate will face complex technical challenges to keep a minimal impact on performance.
Candidate will be responsible for designing and developing key Sqreen features for client-side security components, as well as backend infrastructure, leveraging deep expertize in the field of software instrumentation and advanced debugging.
This blog post is a technical, high level overview of our Python agent.
Code will reach production fast using modern development methods and tools. Sqreen platform brings cutting edge technologies to solve complex issues in the simplest form. Candidate will have a high consideration of reliability, low-latency, redundancy, and security.
Our engineers have deep impacts on our products and contribute to protecting millions of products. The candidate will be a key contributor of the engineering team at Sqreen, delivering the best solutions to protect applications. Discover what you will be working on
These articles from our blog will show you some of the things we are working on, and what our product looks like:
Behind the Scenes: Building a Dynamic Instrumentation Agent for Python Monitor your application security in New Relic Insights Embedding JavaScript into Python Freeze your Python with str.encode and threads
